file_insights.description: Likely added module reference for Bollinger Bands

patterns_discovered: O(n) rolling calculation approach for technical indicators
Flexible generic implementation supporting multiple numeric types
Comprehensive error handling for input validation
Pre-allocation of output buffers for performance-critical scenarios
gotchas_discovered: Handling NaN values during initial warmup period
Precise variance computation to avoid floating-point errors
Managing period constraints and data length requirements
recommendations: Consider adding more comprehensive documentation examples
Create performance benchmarks to validate O(n) complexity claims
Add more comprehensive test cases covering edge scenarios
Potentially create macro or trait to reduce boilerplate in similar indicator implementations
